title: Counterspell
content:
Counterspell Level 3 Abjuration Spell Nullify another creature's spell as a reaction. The spell must be 3rd level or lower. If it is higher, you must succeed a Check to nullify it, the difficulty of which is based on the spell's Level. 18m Reaction Level 3 Spell Slot

Level 3 Abjuration Spell

Nullify another creature's spell as a reaction. The spell must be 3rd level or lower. If it is higher, you must succeed a Check to nullify it, the difficulty of which is based on the spell's Level.
